name: diskutil-mac
title: Diskutil-Mac
description:
View your disks and volumes
An implementation of the macOS 'diskutil' command with quicker access to features, providing a better overview and a much more userfriendly interface
author: Globolo

commands.name: index
commands.title: Diskutil-Mac
commands.description:
View your disks and volume like with diskutil. Just better. 
(Note: Due To limitation with the diskutil command implementation the execution takes some time with HDDs)
